game.spot.utilities

Class AnswersUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.spot.utilities.AnswersUtilities

  • public class AnswersUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    The AnswersUtilities used to read and create answer from and to data base. All methods are static
